subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{rfe|zh|related to {{cog|za|sai}}, {{cog|vi|xài}}?, or related to [[㩄]]?}}
Probably a {{der|yue|qfa-tak}} substrate word. Compare {{cog|za|sai||to waste}}.
